trans-unit.source: Describes a manifest file reference.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference"></xref> class.
The specified source path of the file.
Returns the set of COM classes referenced by the manifest for isolated applications and registration-free COM.

An array of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass"></xref> objects representing the set of COM classes referenced by the manifest for isolated applications and registration-free COM.
Gets or sets whether the file is a data file.
A Boolean value indicating whether the file is a data file.
Returns the set of proxy stubs referenced by the manifest for isolated applications and registration-free COM.

An array of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ProxyStub"></xref> objects representing the set of proxy stubs referenced by the manifest for isolated applications and registration-free COM.
Returns the set of type libraries referenced by the manifest.
An array of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TypeLib"></xref> objects representing the set of type libraries referenced by the manifest.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference.ComClasses"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference.ComClasses"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference.ProxyStubs"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference.ProxyStubs"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference.TypeLibs"></xref> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileReference.TypeLibs"></xref> property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the file is a data file.
"applicationData" is the only valid setting.
